articles.author: Alexis Petridis
articles.title: Arlo Parks: Collapsed in Sunbeams review – a diaristic, near-perfect debut - The Guardian
articles.description: She may be saddled with being the Voice of a Generation, but the London singer-songwriter’s warm, conversational and observant debut justifies the hype
articles.content: Its hard to know how to feel about the state of Arlo Parks career. The obvious response is to be hugely impressed: here she is, at 20 years old, surfing a wave of critical acclaim, the release of her… [+4563 chars]
